as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

activeSnapPoint.description: The active snap point for the drawer.

closeThreshold.description: The threshold at which the drawer should close.

shouldScaleBackground.description: Whether the background should scale when the drawer is open.
shouldScaleBackground.description_zh: 抽屉打开时背景是否应缩放。

dismissible.description: Whether the drawer can be dismissed.

defaultOpen.description: Whether the drawer is open by default.

direction.description: The direction in which the drawer opens.

events.name: drag
events.description: Emitted when the drawer is dragged.

events.name: release
events.description: Emitted when the drawer is released.

events.name: update:open
events.description: Emitted when the open state of the drawer is updated.
events.description_zh: 抽屉的打开状态更新时发出。

events.name: update:activeSnapPoint
events.description: Emitted when the active snap point of the drawer is updated.
events.description_zh: 抽屉的活动捕捉点更新时发出。
